# ac-notruf-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                                   | Type      | Default           |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------------- |
| `addClass`    | `add-class`    | Additional button classes.                                    | `string`  | `''`              |
| `default`     | `default`      | If false, the default icon won't be used.                     | `boolean` | `true`            |
| `hint`        | `hint`         | hint hint for button.                                         | `string`  | `'Notrufnummern'` |
| `iconUrl`     | `icon-url`     | Url of the icon image.                                        | `string`  | `undefined`       |
| `strokeWidth` | `stroke-width` | Value to adapt stroke width (0 (0%) ... 1 (100%) of regular). | `number`  | `1`               |
